data.author: JeroenDG
data.description:
Count to ten and instantly win a copy of 10 Second Ninja X on Steam

Four Circle Interactive and Curve Digital unveil a brilliant new initiative which will reward anyone with a Pebble smartwatch and the ability to count to 10 with a free PC copy of 10 Second Ninja X.

There’s a catch, of course: You need to be able to count to 10 exactly, to within 100th of a second. 


10 Second Ninja X on PC and consoles distils the puzzle platformer down to its purest form. Players assume control of a highly nimble and deadly ninja, tasked with destroying an army of hostile robots using cunning, speed and lots and lots of throwing stars.

Don’t let the title seduce you too much – reaching the end of the game won’t be easy. The game’s smartly designed to ensure that each level is a puzzle in itself. With just 10 seconds (maximum) to destroy all enemies, players will need to combine brain with throwing stars in order to meet each level’s objectives, with lightning-fast reactions required to be rewarded with a perfect score.

10 Second Ninja X boasts 100 immaculately designed levels. Whilst much of the challenge comes from demonstrating the dexterity and reactions necessary to traverse each level – players with real skill will want to complete each quickly. 

It’s out now on PC, Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and Vita.
www.10second.ninja

 
Instructions: 

Shake wrist to start timer
Shake wrist to stop. 

Up button - about the game
Middle button - retrieve prize if you've won it already
Down button - further information
data.title: 10 Second Ninja X Challenge
